hero.description: We're not just a store â€“ we're a movement. CryptoStore bridges the gap between cutting-edge blockchain technology and premium lifestyle products, creating the ultimate shopping experience for crypto enthusiasts worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: To democratize access to premium crypto-themed products while advancing the adoption of digital currencies as a legitimate payment method. We believe the future of commerce lies in decentralized, borderless transactions.
mission.description2: Every product we curate tells a story of innovation, rebellion against traditional finance, and the belief that technology can create a more inclusive financial future.

missionCards.innovationDesc: Cutting-edge products that represent the future of technology
missionCards.communityDesc: Building the largest crypto lifestyle community

values.title: Our Values
values.transparencyDesc: Like blockchain technology itself, we believe in complete transparency in our operations, pricing, and business practices.
values.excellenceDesc: We source only the highest quality products that meet our rigorous standards for design, functionality, and innovation.
values.communityDesc: We're more than customers and sellers â€“ we're a family of crypto believers building the future together.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.sarahDesc: Former blockchain engineer turned entrepreneur, passionate about making crypto accessible to everyone.
team.marcusDesc: Security expert ensuring every transaction is safe and every customer's data is protected.
team.alexDesc: Visionary designer creating products that bridge the gap between tech and lifestyle.

header.title: Privacy Policy
header.description: Your privacy is our priority. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use CryptoStore.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.intro: We collect information to provide better services to our users. Here's what we collect:

personal.title: Personal Information
list: Name and email address when you create an account
Shipping address for order fulfillment
Payment information (processed securely through Coinbase Commerce)
Communication preferences and customer service interactions

automatic.title: Automatic Information
list: Device information (browser, operating system, IP address)
Usage data (pages visited, time spent, interactions)
Cookie data for personalization and security
Transaction data for order processing and security

crypto.title: Cryptocurrency Information
list: Wallet addresses for transaction verification (anonymized)
Transaction hashes for order tracking
Payment confirmation data from blockchain networks

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

service.title: Service Provision
list: Process orders and manage your account
Facilitate cryptocurrency payments
Provide customer support and resolve issues
Send order confirmations and shipping updates

improvement.title: Improvement and Analytics
list: Analyze website usage to improve user experience
Develop new features and products
Conduct security monitoring and fraud prevention
Optimize payment processing and delivery

communication.title: Communication (With Consent)
list: Send promotional emails about new products
Share crypto market insights and educational content
Notify about special offers and events
Provide important service updates

protection.title: Data Protection & Security
protection.intro: We implement industry-leading security measures to protect your data:

technical.title: Technical Safeguards
list: End-to-end encryption for all sensitive data
Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption for all communications
Regular security audits and penetration testing
Multi-factor authentication for account access

operational.title: Operational Security
list: Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
Regular employee training on data protection
Secure data centers with physical access controls
Automated backup and disaster recovery systems

payment.title: Payment Security
list: We never store cryptocurrency private keys
Payment processing handled by Coinbase Commerce
PCI DSS compliance for traditional payment methods
Real-time fraud detection and prevention

rights.title: Your Rights & Choices
rights.intro: You have several rights regarding your personal information:

access.title: Access & Control
list: View and download your data
Update your account information
Delete your account
Opt-out of marketing communications

settings.title: Privacy Settings
list: Manage cookie preferences
Control data sharing
Set communication preferences
Request data portability

rights.help: Need Help? Contact our privacy team at privacy@cryptostore.com for any questions about your data rights or to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.addressValue: CryptoStore Privacy Team 123 Blockchain Avenue Crypto District, CD 12345 Decentraland
contact.responseValue: We respond to privacy inquiries within 48 hours.
contact.updateNote: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the "Last Updated" date above.

header.title: Refund Policy
header.description: Our refund policy is designed to protect both our customers and our business. Please read carefully before making a purchase.

eligibility.title: Eligibility for Refunds
eligibility.intro: Refunds are available under the following conditions:
list: Returns within 30 days of delivery for unused items in original packaging
Defective or damaged products upon receipt
Incorrect items shipped
Overpayments or duplicate charges
Cancelled orders before shipment

process.title: Refund Process
list: Contact support@cryptostore.com with your order number and reason
We review requests within 2-3 business days
Approved refunds processed within 5-10 business days
Return shipping costs are customer's responsibility unless item is defective
Restocking fee of 10% may apply for non-defective returns

crypto.title: Cryptocurrency Refunds
list: Refunds issued in the same cryptocurrency as original payment
Amount based on original USD value to account for volatility
Network fees deducted from refund amount
Transactions are irreversible - no refunds for completed blockchain transfers to wrong addresses
Exchange rate locked at time of refund processing
crypto.warning: Warning: Cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible. Double-check wallet addresses before sending.

limitations.title: Limitations and Exclusions
list: No refunds for digital products or custom items
No refunds for cryptocurrency price fluctuations
No refunds for used or opened items (except defects)
We reserve the right to deny refund requests
Refunds may be issued as store credit at our discretion

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.response: We respond to refund inquiries within 48 hours.

header.title: Terms of Service
header.description: Please read these terms carefully before using CryptoStore. By using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.intro1: By accessing and using CryptoStore ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
acceptance.intro2: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website located at cryptostore.com (the "Service") operated by CryptoStore ("us", "we", or "our").
acceptance.important: Important: These terms include provisions that limit our liability and require individual arbitration for disputes. Please read them carefully.

use.title: Use of Service

permitted.title: Permitted Use
list: Browse and purchase products for personal, non-commercial use
Create an account to track orders and manage preferences
Use our customer support services
Share product reviews and feedback

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
list: Use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
Use automated tools to access the service (except search engine crawlers)
Reproduce, duplicate, or resell any part of our service
Use the service to transmit viruses, malware, or harmful code

use.ageText: You must be at least 18 years old to use this service. By using CryptoStore, you confirm that you are 18+ or have parental consent.

payments.title: Cryptocurrency Payments

processing.title: Payment Processing
list: Cryptocurrency payments are processed through Coinbase Commerce
We accept Bitcoin, Ethereum, and 13+ other major cryptocurrencies
All transactions are final once confirmed on the blockchain
Network fees are separate from product prices and non-refundable

terms.title: Price and Payment Terms
list: Prices are displayed in USD and converted to cryptocurrency at checkout
Exchange rates are locked in for 15 minutes during checkout
Incomplete payments may be cancelled after 24 hours
Overpayments will be refunded minus network fees

payments.warning: Warning: Cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible. Double-check wallet addresses and amounts before sending payment. We cannot recover funds sent to incorrect addresses.

processing.title: Order Processing
list: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days after payment confirmation
We reserve the right to cancel orders due to product unavailability
Order confirmation emails are sent to the address provided
Bulk orders may require additional verification

shipping.title: Shipping
list: Free worldwide shipping on orders over $100
Standard shipping: 5-10 business days
Express shipping: 2-3 business days (additional fee)
Tracking information provided via email
Customers are responsible for import duties and taxes

delivery.title: Delivery
list: Risk of loss passes to buyer upon delivery to carrier
You must provide accurate shipping information
Delivery delays due to customs are beyond our control
Undeliverable packages may incur additional fees

policy.title: Return Policy
list: 30-day return window from delivery date
Items must be unused and in original packaging
Return shipping costs are buyer's responsibility
Some items may be non-returnable (custom products, intimate items)

process.title: Refund Process
list: Refunds processed within 5-10 business days after return receipt
Cryptocurrency refunds subject to current exchange rates
Network fees are deducted from refund amounts
Store credit may be offered as an alternative

liability.title: Liability & Disclaimers
liability.availabilityText: We strive to provide uninterrupted service but cannot guarantee 100% uptime. We may temporarily suspend service for maintenance, updates, or unforeseen circumstances.
liability.limitationText: In no event shall CryptoStore be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
liability.warning: Important: Cryptocurrency prices are volatile. We are not responsible for market fluctuations, network congestion, or technical issues with blockchain networks.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
contact.addressValue: CryptoStore Legal Team 123 Blockchain Avenue Crypto District, CD 12345 Decentraland
contact.updateNote: These Terms of Service may be updated from time to time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.
